title: Please Riot fix and buff Quinn!
body:
So once again to see a balanced champion taking buffs that he dosent need and end up in 100% pick ban phase and then gutted in the next patch!!

Like 

{{champion:103}} (Hurr durr DFG removal much bad rito buff) (5 nerfs and she still OP)
{{champion:201}} (Rito braum need buffs he cant keep up hurr durr) one patch buffed next patch insta nerfed!
{{champion:69}} (Rito cass rework bad cass need buff hurr durr rito pls) (Insta nerfed 4 times in the row because she become cancerous)
{{champion:60}} (I am not gonna even bother here is fairly new....)
{{champion:114}} (just....yeah..."Rito rito new rework fiora bad and weak would need buffs) riot buff her aaaaaaaaaaaand 100% ban ratio cancerous champ!
{{champion:104}} (Back when everyone was crying about how "weak" is graves rito buff his ulti and Q and he become insta banned/picked)
{{champion:24}} (Soon dont worry if people keep crying about how "weak" he is and riot keep buffing his late game....i mean i guess we forgot why he got nerfed in the first place....)
{{champion:76}} (Rito rito wtf new reworked nidalee no damage hurr durr buff pls) we all know where this lead....
{{champion:133}} (Soon....)
{{champion:113}} (Sej much weak rito buff her pls buff buff buff pls....) We all know where this lead...
{{champion:72}} (I am not gonna even here.....66% win ratio...)
{{champion:223}} (Soon...special if riot keep buff him because people still think he is "weak)
{{champion:45}} (VERY SOON he will get gutted keep asking for buffs...keep asking)
{{champion:157}} (I am not gonna even bother here....when he first came out "OMG RITO YASUO SUCKS BUFF BUF FBUFF BFUFBFFUBFBFFBUFBUFBUBFBUB) Riot buff him and he end up in 120% ban/pick ratio yeah not trolling he break the 100% go check his lolking history...and he is still OP!!

I may forgot some few other examples but you get the point!!

You people want champions to get buffed but riot nerf this champions because their kit was toxic and strong and now you want riot to bring this champ back to their old version? i mean this is just stupid!!

But anyway keep asking for Quinn buffs and he will be 100% ban rate and then in the next patch he will get gutted and one more range champion would be removed from top lane!! So thank you all of you for asking for Quinn buffs!

replies.body: Quinn is a SHE not a he. People don't know what they want at all really.
Sorry, I find it difficult to take anyone seriously that thinks Ahri is strong.

> [{quoted}](name=Emmy Cha0s,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rhMEVyOl,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-25T13:55:35.098+0000)
>
> Sorry, I find it difficult to take anyone seriously that thinks Ahri is strong.

the 57% win ratio says so...

...and there's strike #2: someone who attempts using win rates as an excuse.

Or are you going to tell me Amumu is the most broken champ in the game cause he had the #1 win rate for a hella long time?

> [{quoted}](name=Emmy Cha0s,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rhMEVyOl,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-09-25T14:18:28.526+0000)
>
> ...and there's strike #2: someone who attempts using win rates as an excuse.
> 
> Or are you going to tell me Amumu is the most broken champ in the game cause he had the #1 win rate for a hella long time?

and riot nerf him 4 times in the row when that was a thing? and even the pros and riot have say that ammumu power was too strong....

Yeah you were saying?

ANyway stay bronze when you hit diamond we talk

Woah you used your rank to support an argument? I've totally never seen that before. How bout you actually formulate words into an intelligent conversation and actually talk about your reasoning for things. Use your own reasoning as well no (in your words) "Hurr durr win rate"

48.76% winrate say's that yasuo could use a buff or so to push him above the 50% mark. Also I don't know where you got a 57% win rate on ahri, the highest I see is lux. Has a higher win rate and a lower amount of games played by her  player base on average.
So because you like win rates so much buddy ol pal, let's have a look here :P
{{champion:99}} has a higher winrate than ahri
as for braum? Brand is number 1 win rate support atm and braum is number 12
{{champion:69}} win rate is only 46.98%
{{champion:60}} is still number 21 in the jungler win rates and amumu is number 1(such op much wow)
There's an example of your win rates that you love oh so much :P

The stupid thing about everyone saying ahri is op, is that she was way worse with dfg + her charm damage amp and no one was complaining then. Now because she's a kite mage her movement speed is literally the thing making her "op".
dude chill, she is already announced to be getting a rework

> [{quoted}](name=Timmyco,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rhMEVyOl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-25T13:48:11.897+0000)
>
> dude chill, she is already announced to be getting a rework

cool and then she will get gutted and she will be removed for ever from top lane!!

That what i like to see cancerous champs to get buffed and then riot gutt them and never see them again and all that because you people ask for buffs!!

So pls continue!
How is Quinn a cancer champ, she can't really play ADC and in top lane she's much like many other marksman top, which have counters.

Riot Repertoir is looking into it.
Keep up to date with the news m8. :) 

www.surrenderat20.net
